column5: The best break during the school year for me has to be march break. This break for me means one thing and one thing only steelhead.  Apparently Berge (BBNOTTY) is on march break too lol in less then a week he’s taken two days off work lol. So my day started with a mild heart attack when my alarm went off and I proceeded to turn it off role over and fall back into a deep sleep. Luckily I got a mother who didn’t want to hear my complain all day so she barged into my room a quarter after five to tell me to wake up lol. Scared Berge had already come and gone I rushed to call him… after scaring the crap out of me he says “naw man all be there in 10 minutes“. so I grab my gear load it up in the steelie mobile and take off for the tribs. Lately on the way to the tribs we’ve been tying roe in the cars (which my mom freaked out when she found out lol) so after 100 roe bags we were finally in heaven. We suited up greased the shoulders and elbows and proceeded to clam position lol. Not even minutes in Berge smashes a nice steelhead.  I  followed with a freshly hatched steelhead it was so small but a sign of good things to come. Lots of these guy/girls around (always a good sign)     Then I managed to shook both Berge and myself with this spring brown that was as chrome as a steelhead.     Then Berge decided to hook into this screamer literally this fish took off and wouldn’t stop. With a bit of time and patients the fish was subdued. Nice fish bud what a fight.    Fishing died down and with time ticking away we went on the search for some steel.   We arrived at a trib we did well at a week before to see about 5 guys fishing the first pool. We suit up and head down. I see a face I’ve seen before. With some hardcore staring I realized it was MJL. We talked a bit and I told him id show him some water I knew of on the creek. We went walking and got to a nice spot were Berge got a spunky fish.    Shortly after MJL got this little bullet.     All in all it was a great day to be out with great company. It was nice meeting you MJL I am sure well share a few drifts in the near future plus you owe me a fish.
great stuff silvio! its the best when u have a whole week off to fish.  trib #1 is still full of people on a weekday eh?!  btw, i noticed the big fish caught is a droppy already =/
Great Report!  I'll probably be heading out this weekend.
Trib is always packed. And that fish is no droppy its really fresh and its gut hasn't dropped yet.

But Berge and I let you have the first cast into the pool.  It wasn’t our fault you hooked the tree on the far bank.LOL  It was nice to meet both you and Berge today.  Thanks for showing me around that river.  I never fished that stretch of it before and it does look like a nice piece of water.  I now know which trees to hit for some free floats this summer.  Unbelievably chrome   I walked by one of the holes on my way back to the car and just had to set up the rod again for a couple more drifts…Ended up with another small hen identical to Berge’s.  Hope to run into you and Berge on the river again.  I normally fish alone and the company today was nice.  Great report and pics BTW
And the burn continues lol... good job bud.
Guess it is time to use my sick days ... way to go!

Living my youth again? what, you calling me old!!!!!!!!!!  Always nice to get out, chat and catch a few steelies with friends. Silvio great report bud. MJL it was nice to meet you, maybe we'll all meet up again soon.
Good job boys!!!!  Sil, looks like you need to break out the razor kid

Fabulous report .. I was planning to head there (to trib #2) tomorrow and now I can see that is definitely gonna be worth the trip .... I knew it would be but you just confirmed it for me ... great ... now I'll be up all night

Lol bud I busted it out after seeing that pic lol now I sporting the chin strap. Maybe I should spend less time on here so that I can at least have time to shave lol. Bill were going to have to go state side one of these days.
nice fish guys. amazing the huge number of people the past 2yrs that know about that second creek now. oh well no more quiet spot now  lol its above zero. time to put on the shoulder pads lol
No way!  I talked to MJL on that same creek today, and had no idea it was him.  LOL Very nice fish.  I've been fishing all week myself, and am heading out tomorrow morning as well.
I am trying to get the car tomo but doesn't look like I will.  CC that creeks packed with people now just like the rest.
Sounds like you guys had a great time out there!  Congrats on all getting together and catching some nice fish!
Yeah, I'm surprised at how packed it's been this week.
What a refreshing report!  It would be a pleasure to fish with any of you, anytime.
Hey snag, if you see any of us out on the tribs come on over. All of us are extremely friendly and willing to share the spot were fishing with others.
No kidding.  Two years ago I fished that one ALONE

Kemper, there’s a regular on the trib I talk to every time out. He tells me stories about him and the first 5 guys that were fishing that river 15 years ago. I got one creek I need to hit before it goes down hill.  I  need to go work my charm as an innocent teen with one of the land owners.
You like that one eh.

what's all this nonsense I keep hearing about some sort of march break?!?! lol Man when I was in college we got close to 2 weeks off.  I think I fished for a week and half and then crammed the last couple of days....  Nice fish dude - enjoy march breaks while you can!  Cheers, UF
Great report and some nice fish you manged to catch. Well done..  Dirk..
